32#ifndef _LINUX_IOPORT_H_
33#define _LINUX_IOPORT_H_
34
35#include <sys/types.h>
36#include <sys/bus.h>
37
38#define IORESOURCE_IO 0
39#define IORESOURCE_MEM 1
40
41struct resource {
42 bus_addr_t start;
43 bus_size_t size;
44 const char *name;
45 unsigned int flags;
46 bus_space_tag_t r_bst; /* This milk is not organic. */
47 bus_space_handle_t r_bsh;
48};
49
50static inline void
51release_resource(struct resource *resource)
52{
53 bus_space_free(resource->r_bst, resource->r_bsh, resource->size);
54}
55
56#endif /* _LINUX_IOPORT_H_ */
57
